title: World War III - Rock Hudson-80`s
description:
Movies : Action : VHS Rip : English
Movie Description
A made-for-TV thriller about a Russian attempt to blow up 30 miles of the Alaskan Pipeline which would double the U.S.'s dependency on foreign oil. Rock Hudson as president begins negotiations with Soviet officials, hoping to prevent World War III.

Credits 
Cast: Rock Hudson 
Director: David Greene 

Synopsis
After the U.S. organizes a grain embargo against the Soviet Union, soldiers of the latter superpower retaliate by crossing the Bering Strait to block the Alaskan pipeline.

The U.S. Army sends its own troops to the eastern side of the pipeline. The Soviet and American conventional forces prepare to face off against one another. Now it's up to the leaders of each nation to consider two options.

Each can either come to the negotiating table... or launch a global thermonuclear attack...

Film Notes
This two-part miniseries originally aired on television. Tragically, the production's original director, Boris Sagal, was killed during the on-location shoot in Alaska. Producers declared the rest of the film would be completed on indoor sets. Some critics found the ersatz "locations" unconvincing and jarring compared to the authentic settings featured in other sequences.
